items.title: ActiviConnect
items.description: Native Android application for managing attendees and delegates of the Engineering Week activities at PUCP: annual interdisciplinary competitions among Engineering specializations.

items.title: PUCP Clinic
items.description: Website for managing medical care for clinic patients. Integration of APIs for videocalls, Real-Time chat, and data consultation via DNI.

experiences.title: "Hijos de Docentes" Schollarship
experiences.description: I have a full scholarship, funded by the Peruvian government, since 2022 to date, which allows me to continue my university education.

experiences.title: FCE Certificate: English B2
experiences.description: I obtained this certificate in the 5th year of high school at the Colegio de Alto Rendimiento Lima Provincias, which I was able to attend thanks to my outstanding grades in the course.

about.title: About me
about.content1: My name is Beatriz Manrique AvendaÃ±o, AKA mavend. In my university career I have seen many technology applications and I find a lot of interest in programming and Networking. I am currently looking for training spaces to <0>put my knowledge into practice and perform in a professional field</0>.
about.content2: I have participated in <0>demanding projects, both mobile and web, deployment experience in services such as Azure, Google Cloud Platform and AWS</0>, as well as in implementations of SDN and Cloud Computing solutions; and a meaningful understanding in Linux.
about.content3: Being close to graduation, <0>I am always looking for opportunities to continue learning, including online Machine Learning courses and other technologies that complement my academic training.
